title: Peppers and Eggs
introduction: Peppers and Eggs is a hearty and versatile dish that can be enjoyed for brunch or lunch. Whether paired with grilled sausages or stuffed into wedges of crisp Italian bread, this recipe combines saut√©ed peppers with scrambled eggs for a flavorful and satisfying experience.
ingredients: 2 medium red bell peppers, cut into bite-size pieces
1 medium green bell pepper, cut into bite-size pieces

instructions.description: In a 9-inch nonstick skillet, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the peppers, onion, and salt to taste. Cook, stirring often, until the peppers are browned, about 20 minutes. Cover and cook 5 minutes more or until the peppers are very tender.

In a medium bowl, beat the eggs with the cheese and add salt and ground pepper to taste. Pour the eggs over the peppers and let them set briefly. Turn the peppers and eggs with a spatula or spoon to allow the uncooked eggs to reach the surface of the pan. Allow the eggs to set and stir again. Repeat the stirring and cooking until the eggs are set to taste, about 2 to 3 minutes. Serve hot.
